title: The libraries, they are a shiftin' again
summary: In happier news, I'm very glad to see <a href="http://www.theshiftedlibrarian.com/>Jenny Levine'a Radio is back on the air. My condolences on the string of annoyances and disasters along the way. I still think she should've switched to a Mac though. :)
content:
In happier news, I'm very glad to see <a href="http://www.theshiftedlibrarian.com/>Jenny Levine'a Radio is back on the air. My condolences on the string of annoyances and disasters along the way. I still think she should've switched to a Mac though. :)

shortname=ooobgi
